title: How Does Jordan Peterson Fit into the Dutch Social Context
description:
After releasing some of my first videos I struck up a friendship with  Roland den Boef who is a graduate student in philosophy at the Free University of the Netherlands. I asked if he'd be willing to do a video with me and he agreed. 

Geenstilj Interview https://youtu.be/E6qBxn_hFDQ
Eindbazen Interview https://youtu.be/WN1EkcbAMDc
